lines.text: I'm so glad you all came to see the show. It's going to be great tonight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The hype continues.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're going to love it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Without fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are the best seats?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then you're right in it, if something goes wrong, it's nothing between you and whatever terrible, bloody mess is going to happen. It's just the best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing, nothing, you're fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's going to be great, but before you go in, I do have to give you guys a pat-down, 'cause you can't go in with any weapons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Meet us at the front. Actually, you know what? You'll be on card duty. We need a little extra "change on the side."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Card duty it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Face is on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I the only one going, do we really have to give up our weapons? I don't feel okay with this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, I'll do whatever you want, but if you take my weapons I might kill you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you here in a few minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magic! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen. Guys! Wow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grenade lobbed in by Foster at the last second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bringing us back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring that ass back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's so hackneyed. As you guys begin to approach the outside of this large, dark navy tent, people are being inspected and ushered through by the well-groomed half-orc on one side, and the pale woman, Yasha, you met for a second time approaching the outskirts of this carnival, with entry fees being collected by both as people begin to pass into this large structure. A few feet off to the side, you see a small crowd gathered around Mollymauk, who is sitting atop a small blanket and has cards splayed before him, a similar set that you saw Jester toying with earlier, and a farmer sits across from him, listening intently. "All right, so what can you "tell me about this here cough?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you had it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, going on like three, four months." (coughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks like it's getting better. Oh yes. Does it feel like it's getting better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, right now? Yeah."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, look at that. I would maybe breathe a tincture or something. Let's-- yeah, maybe you should get that looked at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From who? What do the cards tell me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some sort of physician, perhaps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right! Of course! Oh, thank you so much." And he places a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Platinum Dragon be with you. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened to 'no sick people'?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is outside the tent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he doesn't enter the tent. He goes off to the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good to see you all here, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. Some of us have weapons that we don't want to pass away to other people, so how much of a chance is it that we could get through without having to do that, you know?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you can't see the show if you have a weapon on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But, you know, we are really good at security, like all of us are really strong, and we could fight things that came up, too, so maybe it would be best if you don't take our weapons, and then we could help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, here's a deal. We'll make you a good deal. You waive our entry fee and if anyone needs to be kicked out, or any security needs to happen, we'll help you out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like deputy bouncers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like deputy bouncers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, see, funny thing about that, though, is that's my job. So.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do you want to hire us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would be like our boss. Have you ever wanted to be a boss? Like, in charge?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could ask you for days off sometimes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A heavy greenish-grey-skinned mitt slaps onto Beau's shoulder, as you glance over to see the large, well-groomed half-orc man standing there. "I'm terribly sorry, but we've got it taken "care of. If you wish to pay entry, you can, but the rules are the rules. So sorry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do they get stored in some sort of locker or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I hold them. And if you want, I can stand right next to you guys. You can keep your eye on me the whole time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's very trustworthy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That seems fair-ish to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yasha, does that seem-- all right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your name, by the by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bo."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's funny, because your name is also Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You didn't have to-- maybe let me choose when to tell people--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, I'm curious about this. How do you spell your name?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's short for Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, mine's just B-O."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did kids make fun-- never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, is his mustache especially B.O.-y? Like, what? That's really gross.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew. I don't want to perceive this. I'm glad I didn't roll very well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I make an insight check? Is he a creep or is he just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check. Eight? Thankfully, you're not in proximity enough to catch a whiff of his mustache.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Interestingly enough, he seems very well put-together. And he seems like he's just fucking with you. He's having fun, and he's messing with you, and he's just casual and competent and actually pretty well-groomed. He doesn't smell. And he seems more just enjoying the discourse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's funny, see, my name's Beau because my parents wanted a son.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. If it helps with any other confusion, call me the Breaker. Well, if you see the rest of "the show, perhaps you'll see why I got my name."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you in the show, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he cracks his arms. "I am. Towards the end."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now I want to see the show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well then. May I?" You can see now the crowd's starting to queue up behind you pretty heavily. "Besides, if you're going to enter, we've got to get through the rest of this riff-raff. Do "you wish to join in?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull-- all I have is a dagger, but I just hand it to Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one dagger?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I promise you I will give it back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, here you go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I promise you I will give you all of your weapons back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pinky-swear me, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ugh. I don't like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Now we're best friends. Here's my sickle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a staff, but I also use it as a walking stick, so I like to keep it on me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you not walk around without it or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She has a really bad limp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sometimes I get a little twinge, a little disc issue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Purely for my own entertainment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you patronizing me, Mollymauk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I keep my stick? (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How about this? I'll take it, and I can just carry you to your seat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you carrying all of these weapons?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You. Can I give him a pat-down, because you're--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, roll an investigation check. I'll give you advantage because you're really good at this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I open up the coat just so she can see the books.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I find anything. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find two books and a modicum of change and nothing else on him. He's actually pretty sparse as far as collectibles and keepsakes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just thought your chest looked rather square, so I wanted to see what was happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm practically concave. Is it concave or convex, I forget?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Concave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hand her my shortsword, but not my little crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a sleight-of-hand check to try and hide that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four. Oh, wait. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on that, technically, right? Dexterity checks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, did you give me dexterity or just stealth? How does that work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's just stealth checks with the blessing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check that real fast.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Going to the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What the heck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're playing First Edition, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is stealth. You're correct. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I wish I wouldn't have said it and then you could have had advantage just then, but I'm not a cheater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you're not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Out of game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him slowly pocketing this crossbow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no, no. Little girl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just a little girl.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Give me your other weapon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a toy for little children. All right, here. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you keeping track of what goes with what person? Because it's a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's very good at this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm very good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just drag Nott five feet over. That is two strikes against you. I think we should really just sort of enjoy the show tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. But what if someone attacks us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'll handle that for you, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, little girls don't tend to tell people they're little girls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When someone is a goblin in the middle of a town where people hate goblins--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop saying the word 'goblin'. People are going to hear you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Technically, I dragged her away, but you know, D&D is funny with what is known and not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I heard you over the earring.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: RIP.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I didn't get your weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to stare at me all day, or do you want to give me the weapon so you can go watch the show?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an interesting choice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not really a choice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you pull out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My falchion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A falchion, a large, curved sword, emerges from a sheath on his back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a falchion!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to hang out with us the whole night?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll hang out beside you so you can watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, that's enough. As she spins the falchion around, you notice that, affixed to her back, in uncharacteristically clean leather towards the rest of her outfit, what appears to be a slung-over sheath and a very large bladed weapon, larger than your falchion, affixed to her back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just like how everyone says 'falchion'.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick up my cards in a very specific order very quickly and start stacking the deck.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, well. If you want to follow me, I'll take you to your seats and I'll stand beside you the whole time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking lead the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, Jester. Before you go. Tiefling to tiefling, and thank you for keeping this rabble in check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, you know, they're a lot to handle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One on the house. And I pull two cards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes? What are you telling me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this mean anything to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, think about it. Put it away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both her and the half-orc turn to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Little one. I just go over and I fireman-style over my shoulder. Since you can't walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just carries her right in. Perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn back to the rest of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Such grace! Such form! Such dignity!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The birds are out already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the other Bo, Bo the Breaker, goes ahead and collects five copper from each of you as you pass through, so mark off five copper, except for the two of you, you guys are part of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I skip around, will I be part of the show and then I don't have to pay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weirdly, being part of the show means you strangely pay more. I'm not entirely sure how that works.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, do you have five copper?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For you, Caleb, I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not asking. I was going to help you, but if you have it, you're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you've been spotting me all day, I'll take care of both of us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Mollymauk. That Jester's adorable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. Highly entertained.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you guide them, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you guys want to sit in the front row?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what we were told is the best seat in the house.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We want to sit in the front row.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there's-- if you consider a semicircle pattern here, there's-- if you're entering, you can go front to the right, front to the left, front to the center, anywhere in between. Where would you like to be currently sitting?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Front and center? Or do you want to be on the sides?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Front and center!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take them to the front and center.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Front and center, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep my hand on my meager purse for the evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as I sit down, I'm going to pull out my sketchbook and draw the moon and the shadow card that Molly showed me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we're walking over, I say, hey, Yasha, 'cause I was totally on your shoulder, heard you talking about my friend, Jester.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't mean anything by it. I just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, dude. No, she's never mentioned a significant other, so, I mean.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I'm not looking for anything, I just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, cradle me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's an extra charge. We do do that, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, it's an extra five gold pieces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five gold?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: These arms are worth a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a very swaddling hug. You've never experienced anything like it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the best way to see the show, if that's how you want it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give you five silver just to have your shrug to sit on so my butt's not on the floor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't take off my shrug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How about you just keep your money and I'll put you in a chair and I'll just watch over your weapons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she places you on the ground, as there are no chairs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On the ground, I mean, because there's no chairs.

lines.text: They sport serpentine makeup, scales affixed to the sides of their face and arms. Approaching the central spire, the pole that holds the tent up, one immediately leaps onto the shoulders of the other, bending her back a near-impossible amount, creating this humanoid sculpture that you see the front row cringe at the idea of the pain that would cause an average individual. But these halflings are very nimble and able to create almost a single form out of two bodies. Their rigid form becomes fluid to the eye as they move and shift to the music, the violin now sourceless once again, not seeing where this Desmond is placed, but they seem to move as it picks up speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see his legs shaking as he stands, his cheeks wet with tears. He shouts (exclaims). His arms drop and clutch his chest. Gurgles a burst of vocal pain once more, and folks nearest to him begin to lean away as he begins to shake. You glance over as the old man yells out once more, as the skin on his arms suddenly begins to tear, the bones splitting from the flesh, writhing, cracking. Dust and blood shake from his wounds as his form swells. Screams begin to ring out from the audience around him, people rising up and running for the exit. Chaos breaks into the room around you. Toya's song abruptly ends, the little girl looking down with fright in her eyes, the devil-toad glancing about worriedly, the half-orc and the fool rushing up beside him to look at the transforming man. The half-orc yells, escorting patrons to the exit, "Everyone! Leave the tent now! Kylre--" As he points to the devil-toad. "--get her to safety." The devil-toad glances up and leaps with a sudden gust of strength to the top and grabs the center pole of the room as it begins to almost quiver to his weight. He grabs the little girl safely under his arm and leaps back down. What are you all doing?

lines.text: All right, I know that it's restricted movement, but I will push this way through the crowd so that I have a clearer shot, as far as I can, and then I will re-up with Chromatic Orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can push right about there. You just barely pull through the crowd to the front to get a clear--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I certainly don't want to do that. I want to stay in the crowd, behind people, and I will do Chromatic Orb again, but this time, I'm going to set it to acid, so see if it hit. Oh, that's not good, it's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 unfortunately does not hit. So as you pull it out a second time, you're pushing through the crowd and you pull up your diamond, and right as you're about to release the spell, one of the people in the crowd slams into you with her shoulder and you get jarred off to the side. The acid bolt of the Chromatic Orb flies off and actually burns a hole through the distant tent and then vanishes into the night sky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hope that didn't hit anyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Caleb. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have eyes on the biggie? Is Fjord right next to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord and Mollymauk are both next to it, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to peek out behind whatever patron I'm next to, take out my little crossbow and just shoot a little shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it made of piano wire? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like how every time you roll it comes out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To inflict another two points of damage, so that's 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you pull around the corner and release your one crossbow bolt, it hits the bottom of the chin and pokes out one of the eyes. The eye goes flying off into the distance as the bolt is now jammed outside of the socket. The creature turns, glancing your direction. It looks pretty hurt, but it's still standing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my action-movement-whatever bonus to look at the patron I'm next to. Do they have any baubles or jewelry on them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In this moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you can use your bonus action to just look. There's nothing you can do this turn, but next turn, you could. So make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's just nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? It's hard to look. You see this what looks to be late-30s woman dressed in some sort of general workers' clothing with a loose apron, and she's just running and scrambling to get towards the exit. You don't see anything of worth on her, unfortunately. Sorry. All right, Nott, that ends your turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still engaged with it, right? Okay, I'm going to take two swipes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you spin around. You pull your second scimitar out, as part of the strike, one of them encased in ice crystals. So the first strike-- make sure you mark which one's which.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Purple's the ice. That's-- the purple is 12 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 just barely hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's going to be-- or all three, then, because the other one is 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The first one is four points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four points of damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry, the magic one is six points plus three ice, so nine points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The other one is four points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the first strike hits, and as the scimitar carves through, the body snaps and opens, and it snaps back into place, the torso locking back in. The second strike does how much damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone, anyone? Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ending Mollymauk's turn, that brings us to Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, you got this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In response to him, I say, I thought you said you didn't let in the sick!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just kill it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I come up and I want to do a flying Superman (impact).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wham! Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one. Okay. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had my staff-- oh, I had my staff, but I said--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said Superman punch, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine, it's fine. Six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage. Natural 20. You watch as you sock it in the face and the jaw breaks and then snaps back into place. As you land, pulling it back, you can see some of the teeth are actually stuck in your fist as you pull back, they've broken off into your knuckles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, oh, come on. I'm going to use my other ki point to do flurry of blows again, and I'm going to try and punch him in the bridge with the remainder of his teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her teeth, technically, this is the woman that was killed originally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I'll be like, you were so pretty, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Two more strikes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19 and 18. Natural. And then, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a really pretty dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight, 12, 13 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it turns, the jaw, it pulls back one of its weirdly swollen clawed hands, ready to go for that open wound in your gut, and as it does, how do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First blood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do the uppercut with the other one, and the one that has its teeth in it, I want to go right between the bridge of the nose and get the teeth right in the eyes and break the nose bridge into the brain. You know that thing? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the skull caves in, the teeth piercing both of the red, bulging eyes. And with this horrible sucking, sighing sound, it falls onto its back, no longer moving, the shadows released.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab my gash and fucked-up ribs and immediately turn over me. Can I do a perception check or an insight check on any of the ringleaders? On any of what was going on? The ringleader or the jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sir, I don't know how he got in here." And everyone looks around back at you. Bo looks at you, Gustav looks to you, Molly. "What happened?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of them turned. I don't know what happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a sick guy! There was an old sick guy and he turned into a zombie! And I run over and I cast Cure Wounds on Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank you, man. I'm really down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sick too? Did you get hurt? Hold on two seconds. I'm going to cure her and then I'll cure you too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, have you ever seen anything like this happen before?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. Never.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven points, that's all I could cure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's amazing. That's great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to drop my sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's better for you, ten for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At this point, the two Crown's Guard that are there are trying desperately to maintain control. You can see they're visibly shaken, and they glance at each other like they're a little out of their depths at the moment. "Stay where you are. Don't go anywhere."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wherever will I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he turns to the one who's in the front, looks to the other one who just made his way through, and goes, "Sivelmen, find someone. Bring the rest of the guard. Please!" "Right now, sir." And he pushes his way towards the back as the rest of the crowd runs out. Now everyone in the crowd has mostly pushed out of the tent, the last few dregs pushing through. Children crying, people of Trostenwald just exiting out the flaps as they close, and you're all standing there, weapons in your hands, wondering what to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are the corpses doing now that they've fallen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both unmoving, ruined, torn apart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I search the corpse of the woman?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. As you go to move to it, both of your forms merge. The Crown's Guard goes like, "Don't move."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both? Uh." He looks genuinely confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When I'm going "which one?" I make my second form just dart forward and start searching the body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It mimics searching a body. It's not actually you. Begins rifling imaginary things out of the pockets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he turn and look and I try to search the other guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check to try and deceive him to glance over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not bad. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He goes, "What, over there?" Looks over as you jump over quickly and begin searching through it, and you guys watch her do this, and there's a clear line of sight. As soon as he turns back, he's going to notice her rifling through the other corpse.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is Gustav still in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gustav is now walking up, and he's hands up in the air. "I'm terribly sorry. I-- this has "never happened. I don't know what happened. What happened?!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've never seen anything like it before. He just-- he gripped his heart and fell over and turned into that thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was when Toya started singing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what's with the dwarven girl? Why--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's been singing with us for over two years, now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How'd she come to you? She's a pretty young girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We seized it. We gave her a family she didn't have."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put your hands down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Crown's Guard goes like (grunts). "It's fine, just don't move."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I find anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She uses a different dice for everything, Travis?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that what I'm dealing with now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not even ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to rifle through the old man's body, through the stringy bits of gore, and you do find three pieces of silver that are just coated in blood. A few moments pass. The rest of the people are gone, and it's just this awkward quiet, and at this point you watch as Ornna, the fire fairy who had previously performed, walks in and is like, "I'm sorry. What has happened here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your little dwarf girl was singing, and she turns people into zombies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel that that was entirely coincidental. I'm really not sure that the two things were related. Something was wrong with this man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, it's interesting, because I would say the opposite. I would say it wasn't that coincidental, because--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would agree, it seemed to happen with this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've seen her sing dozens, hundreds of times. Nothing like this has ever happened. I've seen people sit in the front row hundreds of times. Nothing like this has ever happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you had the elderly or the sick in these tents before?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you also happen to be very explicit on your page that you don't want the sick, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gustav.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this motion, Gustav goes, "It's generally just because we want to promote a space of "welcoming cleanliness. When we're working amongst the outskirts of the Empire, we don't want to "bring an element that reminds you of death and--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You hate old people so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're in entertainment. We have to be cautious." The single Crown's Guard guy who's sitting there with his weapon out, you can see him shaking almost, he's never had to deal with anyting like this before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold up. I've never seen that one before. He looks really suspicious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the guy behind him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) He does look suspicious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Don't try that on me. I've been doing this for over ten years."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh wait, look at him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Thaumaturgy and make it sound like there's a sound coming from behind him, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight-of-hand check to see if you can cast this spell subtly enough or not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This poor guard. Ooh! (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you attempt to cast this spell, a little bit of spittle gets caught in your windpipe, and you begin to cough uncontrollably. Yeah, it just falls away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (coughing) There was some popcorn that I ate earlier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should know that whatever happened to that first man when he attacked the woman, she caught whatever he had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And that is extremely worrying. Nobody touch that body." And he looks back and sees you coughing over the corpse, and the guy's like, "Don't you touch that body! Are you sick?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (coughing) I have bloody fingers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Someone hold her down. If she's sick and turns into one of these, I will not--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's fine. Just calm down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we've already killed two of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's definitely sick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was cocked, unfortunately. That was a good one. Oh, well. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? His face goes white and he goes, "Kill the thing!" And rushes forward, blade held above.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take out my greatsword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, you're going to kill a guard?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stop, stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He holds back. He turns to you and sees you standing a full four inches taller than him with a much larger blade, with one hand, and he goes, "Look, if she's going to become one of these "things, we have to stop her now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha will totally kill me. Don't worry, you can leave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester. Jokes are great until they get you killed, man. She's joking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (weak laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Poor guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately rubs his eyes. You can see him, now that he's closer to you, you can see he's sweating, he's scared, he's generally trying the best he can to use whatever training he's received to deal with a scenario he was not trained for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the King's Guard guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the Crown's Guard. The Crown's Guard are all generally hired and trained militia that are sent amongst all the cities to keep the peace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your name, man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, he's really shook up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jamieson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Flynn."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flynn. How long you been doing this, you said ten years?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ten years two months ago."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Happy ten year-i-versary. Yeah, congrats. Did you get a nice watch or like a commemorative tankard?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't have watches yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. Did you get a commemorative tankard? Forget the watch part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Don't move."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, man. How about first we put the swords down, because we helped? Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are any of us high charisma? 'Cause it don't seem like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the flaps at the front of the tent, the entranceway, fold in and you watch as one, two, three, four, six, ten Crown's Guard begin filtering into the chamber. You watch as one man, the one who has his helmet off and under his shoulder, he's maybe in his early 40s or so, short brown hair with patches of grey. Somewhat jaundiced skin. Molly, you've encountered this man once before when you entered the city. He approaches Gustav right now with a commanding voice. "I had a gut feeling that you were nothing but trouble when you came into our town." Gustav turns around. "I guarantee to you, my friend, I have no idea--" "What happened here?" The Crown's Guard who's been shaken turns around and goes, "Sir, Flynn. There was a creature. This carnival "seemed to create some sort of terrible entity that killed and then created a secondary beast. I "watched it with my own eyes from the back row." And the man turns back towards Gustav and the rest of you. "And who else saw that?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's possible that he just died because he was old, and then he had the zombie curse on him and just turned, you know? Because that happens a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever will we do now that we've been discovered for our brilliant plot to make a zombie ruin our circus. My god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flynn turns to you and goes, "Put your weapons down or we'll arrest you immediately!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm literally holding nothing but my hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm sorry, but we're basically a group of strangers. Most of us don't know each other. We all have the same story. There was a show, an old man became a thing, and we helped destroy it. This one destroyed it. What more do you want from us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It ruined our show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flynn turns back and says, "Watchmaster, what should we do?" And the man with the helmet under his arm walks forward, walks to Gustav, gives him one look over, still a few inches shorter than him. Looks at him with a sense of purpose and social status that has a sense of disinterest and disrespect. "You, sir, and your orc, and your circus, are considered currently "under arrest. Who else belongs to your merry band?" He looks about the rest and Gustav goes, "The orc." Glances back at the two of you and goes, "The rest of them are just purveyors of our "performances. He was just joking earlier, right?" Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you are also under arrest. The rest of you, what are your names?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shirley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb Widogast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau, same as him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am Bo!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You pointed at me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I meant the NPC Bo! But it works!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here's the thing. Oh, it's Mary by the way, but I think I know who might know what has happened here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you? Tell me."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll have to go get her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who is this?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She is the singer that made this all happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Flynn, escort this woman to retrieve this individual she speaks of." Flynn nods and walks over towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's really shy, though, and I hear she only talks to tieflings, so you should probably send--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stay where you are."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --my brother along, because he's really good with that stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try not to stab any random people on your way there, Flynn. You're doing good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My men tell me that the rest of you helped destroy these fiends. Is that correct?"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then on behalf of the Starosta, I appreciate your aid. But until this investigation "is complete, you are all under investigation from us. Where are you staying?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Nestled Nook Inn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nested Nook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nestled. He got it right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. One letter. God damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have an intelligence of 14. I know what I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do not leave this city unless you are told otherwise. Should you do so, I have your names, "and I can have the full might of the Cerberus Assembly track you down. You. Flynn. Free this "girl." While you all stand in the tent, Flynn approaches you and walks a little bit behind you, weapon drawn but at the side. Do you lead him out of the tent? Okay. So you walk through the performer's flap, and as you walk out, you can see backed up into the number of tents that are set up, and some of the carts, other members of the circus are hiding, and as soon as you exit out the front and they see you before the Crown's Guard, they all immediately scatter and vanish to the nearby shadows, out of sight. The two of you walk out into the center, the fire crackling in a small pit off to the side. "All right, where is this girl you speak of?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's in the back in the tents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Show me."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Follow me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He follows you. Which tent do you lead him to? Over here? Okay, there's a larger tent, as he walks by your side, there's the flap that's slightly open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God, you could seduce him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Go get her. She won't talk to me. She's too scared of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." Gets his weapon ready and walks into the tent.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I close the tent and I take off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you don't look back, and you just run into the darkness of night, into the Marrow Fields and disappear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that's so mysterious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While that was happening, I'm close to the edge of the tent, and at some point I just (snap) and summoned Frumpkin. I have a 30-feet outside the tent, so Frumpkin's out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin keeps watch. The Watchmaster, as you heard him notified earlier, turns to the rest of you. "So. The investigation will begin. If any information comes to light that could "alleviate you of the charges brought to this carnival, come to me and let me know. If you have "no answers before we complete this investigation, then I believe you all will fall into the judgment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Next time we don't help. That's what it comes down to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what lesson to learn here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just say okay and let's leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're stuck behind with Gustav and Bo the Breaker, with a guard of five Crown's Guards set to keep watch. As the rest of you are sent to the city, the Watchmaster turns once more and says, "Remember, you flee, I'll find you." And that's where we'll end tonight's session.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No way! What? No! I want to keep playing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited, this is great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a good spot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We did it, we did it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to get Molly out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Truer words were never spoken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Season two, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels so weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at these cool Wyrmwood cases that we have!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fucking Sam. I swear to god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I used 100% new dice. No repeats from Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally new dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kept the Gil die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I used some new dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I used this beautiful little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Snitch is mine now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at all the 20s Taliesin rolled tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Oh man. I'm excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Such cool characters, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited to see where this goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's Travis?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone did something that revealed them tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know nothing, I don't know how to play D&D.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we all say in case you're Sam and you don't know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a ballerina.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a prima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, guys. Happy New Year. Welcome back, Happy New Year to you guys. Thank you for coming along with us on this first episode of a new journey. Thank you, Backblaze and DnD Beyond, for being awesome sponsors partnered with us going forward. Thank you, Wyrmwood, for this amazing table. Thank you guys for coming along with us this evening for our first dive into this new venture. Hope you enjoyed it. We did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you to our amazing crew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Matt Mercer, for this amazing new campaign! Welcome to Wildemount.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Yev.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, have a wonderful evening. We'll see you next week. See where this next stage in the story takes us. Ashley, I'm glad you could make it for this first episode.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until then, have a wonderful night, sleep well, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! (cheering) [music]
